keywords.DESCRIPTION: #ySpell are some powerful and unique cards. NL #ySpells can be used only once a turn.
After each attack, deal damage equals to the amount of #yHeat, then #yHeat decreases by 1. NL If the attack damages all enemies, the #yHeat damage will damage all enemies too.
Each #yEmbrace will decrease the cost of the card by 1, but when played, the same number of #bVoid will be shuffled into your draw pile. NL After played, #yEmbrace will be reset to 0.
Whenever you draws a #ySupplement card, draw one more card.
Cards with #yEcho can be played multiple times in one turn. NL A card can only be buffed when played first time in the turn.
